vsParam:
Phew.
[px], our work is done, right?

I think so.
Guys, thank you all for your help.

You are welcome.
We ought to help each other in times of need.

That's right.
A holiday is only interesting and joyful when we're together!
... You'd sound more convincing if you take your eyes off the ocean.
Hahaha, you saw me right through...?

So, next... Ah, found it, found it!
Hey—Verbena—!

Hey, it's you guys. Judging from your faces,
I assume that you have finished all the work, right?

Yeah, perfectly done!
Because we have gotten used to being given work abruptly!

Oh, have you?
In this case, I shall give you more...

Ah!
May I ask you, Verbena?

Yeah?
You are... Sue, right? How can I help you?

Hmm, Verbena, you were a pirate, right?
And a female pirate!!

That's right.
I was the Captain of the Voltex!

That's right...!
And, I was told by [px].
That you have had a veeeery hot love affair, right!?

The hot love affair of a female pirate... So intriguing!
Was it forbidden love with a rivalrous Captain?
Or a long-distance relationship between the land and the sea...

W-wait a minute?
[px]? What did you instill into her mind...
I really want to hear it~!
I really want to know it~!

Wow, they're really good at probing...
... It's so hard to fool little kids...

OK, I get it. I get it!
Alright, I'll tell you!

But! There's a but!
Telling you my story for nothing is against the pirate rules.

Pirates don't give out something for nothing. We trade!
I'll trade my "Love Story" for something you do for me!

Yes. There are 4 legendary monsters in Eruleum—
They are called the "Four Ocean Lords of Eruleum".

If you could defeat them... I'll share with you
my "Love Story" outright.

What, Verbena!?
The "Four Ocean Lords of Eruleum"...!

Don't talk, Amaryllis!
How's that, everyone? Do you accept this deal?
Sounds exactly like what I'd love to do!

We'd do anything to hear about your
"Love Story"!

Seriously!?
We're to do such a difficult thing just to hear a story!?

... I see.
You've shown your determination.

The "Four Ocean Lords of Eruleum" are the "Tyrant Puni",
the "Emperor Merman"...

And the "Crown Treant"
and the "Emperor Chimera".

They are quite powerful...
Try not to get hurt.

I see...
This task sounds quite challenging...

Yeah. But... For the sake of the "Love Story", we can't lose.
We must first collect some information.

Ayesha?
Even you are enthusiastic about it!?

Yeah, we need to defeat 4 monsters...
In this case, shall we split up and collect information?

Sue, Ayesha, Logy and I will each cover information collection
for one of the "Four Ocean Lords of Eruleum".

And then, [px] and Peppermint will summarize
the information and decide on our next moves.

Yeah, good idea!
Are you okay with it, [px]?

Heehee, don't mention it!
I'm doing this for the "Love Story"!
The operation to hear Verbena's "Love Story"...
